entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 13.
